title: Award-winning journalist Jessica Bennett speaks about Equity Fluent Leadership, applying a gender lens
description: UC Berkeley's Center for Equity, Gender & Leadership is hosting a seminar regarding equity fluent leadership with the First Gender Editor of The New York Times, Jessica Bennett, and the Founder and Executive Director of EGAL, Kellie McElhaney. Together they will openly discuss the effort to elevate the stories of women across major media, the complicated dynamics of consent, and Overlooked, a project to provide obituaries to women who never received them.
